resources.string: Help me to improve this App
Oops, Can not guess your favorite,Try again later!
You have overviewed so many;Do something else.

aKoi is a super convenient translation tool, the idea is that to copy is to translate. 

 Under normal circumstances, we encountered an unknown word in a foreign language reading the article, the common step is, after copying the words, and then switch to the desktop, open the dictionary, translation, understand the meaning, and then return to the reading software, in fact, in the tedious process, we read easily be interrupted, thereby affecting the efficiency of reading a foreign language.

 aKoi will solve this problem, new words encountered in reading software, we only need to copy it, and then you can come out the meaning of words corresponding immediately, eliminating the tedious switching, allowing you to focus on reading.
